description: Describes the specified Amazon Web Services Verified Access instances.

parameters.name: VerifiedAccessInstanceIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the Verified Access instances. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. Filter names and values are case-sensitive. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values.

nested_items.name: VerifiedAccessInstances
nested_items.description: Details about the Verified Access instances.

nested_items.name: VerifiedAccessInstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services Verified Access instance.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description for the Amazon Web Services Verified Access instance.

nested_items.name: VerifiedAccessTrustProviders
nested_items.description: The IDs of the Amazon Web Services Verified Access trust providers.

nested_items.name: VerifiedAccessTrustProviderId
nested_items.description: The ID of the trust provider.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of trust provider.

nested_items.name: TrustProviderType
nested_items.description: The type of trust provider (user- or device-based).

nested_items.name: UserTrustProviderType
nested_items.description: The type of user-based trust provider.

nested_items.name: DeviceTrustProviderType
nested_items.description: The type of device-based trust provider.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The last updated time.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: FipsEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether support for Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) is enabled on the instance.

nested_items.name: CidrEndpointsCustomSubDomain
nested_items.description: The custom subdomain.

nested_items.name: SubDomain
nested_items.description: The subdomain.

nested_items.name: Nameservers
nested_items.description: The name servers.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
